urls.title: Weekend Nature: Back To Nature For Bradford Beck
urls.description: The Environment Agency has worked in partnership with Bradford City Council, Friends of Bradford Beck and the Wild Trout Trust to complete a river restoration project on an urbanised stretch of Bradford Beck in Shipley since 2018.

urls.title: Welcome! You are invited to join a webinar: Schools Climate Summit 2021. After registering, you will receive a confirmation email about joining the webinar.
urls.description: What is the role of schools in helping deliver London's ambitious net zero, circular economy and Sustainable Development Goals by 2030? The inaugural Schools Climate Summit, a flagship event of London Climate Action Week, seeks to harness the power of London schools for climate action. Under the motto 'Think Like A System, Act As A Sector' the Summit challenges London's 3,500 diverse schools to unite and deliver at scale. A unique partnership with the Mayor of London, London Councils, British Council, Royal Meteorological Society, Let's Go Zero, Global Action Plan, Climate Psychology Alliance & others, the Summit kicks off on Tuesday 29th June with related online events throughout the week. Summit activities are divided into three pillars: Summit Programme, Deep Dive workshops & Schools-based activities. REGISTRATION FOR SUMMIT PROGRAMME (29th JUNE) NOW OPEN - PLEASE USE THE FORM BELOW Other events & resources include: 1. The London Climate Curriculum - 4 lesson plans on London's clima
